programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself) S2 (19/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself»Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy) S2 (20/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La cabane dans l'arbre) S1 (37/52)
programme.desc: «La cabane dans l'arbre»Peppa and George visit Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig. Grandpa Pig built them a tree house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le concours de déguisements) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «Le concours de déguisements»Peppa and George have a party where everyone comes dressed up. Peppa is an elf princess and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to choose which of her friends is dressed up the best.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (The Museum) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «The Museum»Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une chaude journée) S1 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Une chaude journée»It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Galaxie Gourmet) S6 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Galaxie Gourmet»In the Gourmet Galaxy, everyone loves yummy food! But when General Yuck turns everything icky, only a recipe for delicious Moon Muffins can stop her. Master Chef Goby and his apprentice Deema must bake those muffins and save the galaxy!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Un super moment avec Blue) S3 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Un super moment avec Blue»Tickety's Big Musical Morning!: Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and work out what special time is coming up. (S3, ep 11).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Du nouveau à l'école de Blue) S3 (17/18)
programme.desc: «Du nouveau à l'école de Blue»Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Treasure in the Sky / Sidekick Switcheroo) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Treasure in the Sky / Sidekick Switcheroo»After finding a cosmic treasure map, Santiago and crew take to the stars to track the treasure down. // During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Comet Cupcakes) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Comet Cupcakes»Follow the adventures of 8-year-old Santiago Montes, a brave and kind-hearted pirate, and features a Spanish-language and Latino-Caribbean culture curriculum.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La bestiole baveuse) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La bestiole baveuse»A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (A Shark Day's Night) S1 (22/28)
programme.desc: «A Shark Day's Night»A Shark Day's Night: The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. (S1, ep 20a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Apple Pie) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Apple Pie»Guacamole: Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool. (S1, ep 6a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille et les écureuils / A la recherche du bébé kangourou) S6 (20/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille et les écureuils / A la recherche du bébé kangourou»The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard! // It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et l'agent de police) S1 (39/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et l'agent de police»A brand new version of a most familiar bear! A heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques de boue) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques de boue»It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go outside. When the rain stops, Peppa and George get to play one of their favourite games - jumping in muddy puddles! Things get very muddy indeed when Mummy and Daddy Pig join in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (A la recherche de Mr. Dinosaure) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «A la recherche de Mr. Dinosaure»George's favorite cuddly toy is Mr. Dinosaur. One day Mr. Dinosaur gets stuck in a tree. George thinks he's lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma meilleure amie) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Ma meilleure amie»George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Blue Butterfly) S1 (n°73)
programme.desc: «The Blue Butterfly»The Blue Butterfly: Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. (S1, ep 73).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Atchoum !) S1 (74/78)
programme.desc: «Atchoum !»Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une histoire avec Camila) S3 (15/18)
programme.desc: «Une histoire avec Camila»We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humsquatch / Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc) S6 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humsquatch / Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc»Travelling Travis yelps for help when he finds a mysterious creature in trouble. The PAW Patrol heads to Foggy Bottom to save a Humsquatch! // When a robo-toy causes mayhem in Adventure Bay, Ryder knows who to call to save the far flung flying disc!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pup and the Very Big Baby) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Pup and the Very Big Baby»There's a beached baby whale in Adventure Bay! Can the Paw Patrol work together to reunite it with its mother?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo) S1 (3/20)
programme.desc: «Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo»When Ian is on holidays, Lola takes over as a park ranger for a day, but that is not easy. Mister Staal tries to clean Middenbos with a huge soap machine and creates one big bubble nightmare!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs) S1 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs»Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler) S2 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler»Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby, super requin) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Baby, super requin»Vigo's evil plot to turn everyfishy in Carnivore Cove into babies backfires when toddlers Super Shark and Captain Kelp turn out to be a finful.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fruits Surprise) S1 (n°70)
programme.desc: «Fruits Surprise»When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Giant Strawberry) S1 (n°75)
programme.desc: «The Giant Strawberry»When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Apple Picking) S1 (49/78)
programme.desc: «Apple Picking»The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Talking Flower) S1 (50/78)
programme.desc: «The Talking Flower»Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Amazing Guesser) S1 (51/78)
programme.desc: «The Amazing Guesser»The Amazing Guesser: After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! (S1, ep 51).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Robot Player) S1 (52/78)
programme.desc: «The Robot Player»Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Polly le perroquet) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Polly le perroquet»George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Cache-cache) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache»Peppa and George play hide and seek.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La halte-garderie) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «La halte-garderie»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Maman Pig travaille) S1 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Maman Pig travaille»Peppa accidentally crashes Mama Pig's computer. Papa Pig is trying to get it right.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La poterie) S3 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La poterie»Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les avions en papier) S3 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Les avions en papier»Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant) S3 (51/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Little Monsters) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «The Little Monsters»The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Mission faucon) S3 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Mission faucon»Blaze visits the Animal Island with AJ and Gabby. The Super Air Race is held there. Blaze and his friends want to join in too but only Blaze can't fly.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Glacier Monster Machine) S5 (10/21)
programme.desc: «Glacier Monster Machine»Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot something important - the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach Gasquatch's house in time!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des ours dans la ville / Madame Goodway à la ferme) S6 (17/26)
programme.desc: «Des ours dans la ville / Madame Goodway à la ferme»Bears are asleep all over town! The PAW Patrol must work quietly to save the bears and return them to their cave.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille et le petit loup blanc / L'explorateur égaré) S6 (19/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille et le petit loup blanc / L'explorateur égaré»After an unexpected snowstorm, Everest takes care of a wolf cub when they work together to make sure the Paw Patrol can find them. Touring Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole, where they encounter crocodiles?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime) S1 (14/15)
programme.desc: «L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime»Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick! // When Sir Steel's Slime Machine starts shooting slime everywhere, Bobbi has to pilot the Deer Squad Rescue Carrier to save the city.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le bongo de Bobbi) S2 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Le bongo de Bobbi»Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself) S2 (19/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself»Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.desc: «Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! programme.desc: «La cabane dans l'arbre»Peppa and George visit Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig. Grandpa Pig built them a tree house.

programme.desc: «Apple Pie»Guacamole: Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool. (S1, ep 6a).

programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille et les écureuils / A la recherche du bébé kangourou»The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard! // It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et l'agent de police) S1 (39/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et l'agent de police»A brand new version of a most familiar bear! A heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vélos) S1 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Les vélos»Daddy Pig has grown a large pumpkin. Peppa is cycling, but she wants to cycle without training wheels so she bumps accidentaly into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La boîte à secrets) S1 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La boîte à secrets»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cerf-volant) S1 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le cerf-volant»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Funny Photo) S1 (n°77)
programme.desc: «The Funny Photo»While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Gift Box) S1 (n°78)
programme.desc: «The Gift Box»The Gift Box: The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. But he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift. (S1, ep 78).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Grand Joshini) S4 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Joshini»Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille et le martien de l'antarctique / Un labyrinthe au milieu de la jungle) S7 (3/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille et le martien de l'antarctique / Un labyrinthe au milieu de la jungle»Travelling Travis is on another great adventure when he lands in Antarctica but believes he's actually on Mars. // Mr. Porter and Alex go on a sightseeing hike but get trapped inside a huge maze! The Paw Patrol has to find the maze and their friends!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Kai Express / Ducknado) S1 (4/15)
programme.desc: «Kai Express / Ducknado»When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur) S1 (15/20)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur»Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel "borrows" water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog) S2 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Ants on a Log) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Ants on a Log»Ants on a Log: Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! (S1, ep 7a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (A Mail Whale Tale) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «A Mail Whale Tale»A Mail Whale Tale: Baby and William join the Mail Whale on a swim along and must deliver a package to the Postmaster General herself. (S1, ep 24a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (3/78)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Smile Day) S1 (53/78)
programme.desc: «Smile Day»When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (No Panic !) S1 (54/78)
programme.desc: «No Panic !»Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Ron's Sunburn) S1 (55/78)
programme.desc: «Ron's Sunburn»Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le portrait de Bubu) S1 (56/78)
programme.desc: «Le portrait de Bubu»Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a gift. She leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher discovers the abandoned painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les déguisements) S1 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Les déguisements»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les nouvelles chaussures) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les nouvelles chaussures»Peppa loses her shoes. She's getting new red shoes. She's so happy she doesn't want to take them off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête de l'école) S1 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La fête de l'école»Peppa and her family go to the street fair at school and do all kinds of things there. Peppa and her friends have their face painted like tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de maman Pig) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de maman Pig»It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La plus grande flaque de boue du monde) S3 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La plus grande flaque de boue du monde»Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Patata-Parc) S4 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Patata-Parc»Peppa and her family visit a new theme park: Potato City. There they discover that the magic of vegetables never ends. (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle maison) S4 (2/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle maison»In this episode, Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see the home that he designed and Mr. Bull and his crew are building. They will help Mr. Bull and be surprised when they find out who their new neighbours are.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Kittens) S1 (37/52)
programme.desc: «The Kittens»Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La grande couronne animale) S3 (15/20)
programme.desc: «La grande couronne animale»When the Great Animal Crown is lost at the bottom of the ocean, Blaze transforms into a super-fast shark to retrieve it for his Animal Island friends. But he'll have to swim fast - or Crusher may get to the crown first.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le pouvoir du recyclage) S5 (8/20)
programme.desc: «Le pouvoir du recyclage»When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un sauvetage bien imprudent / Le fantôme de la mare aux grenouilles) S6 (23/26)
programme.desc: «Un sauvetage bien imprudent / Le fantôme de la mare aux grenouilles»A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le bus touristique / Une nuit au musée) S6 (26/26)
programme.desc: «Le bus touristique / Une nuit au musée»A fun museum sleepover is interrupted when Alex and the mini-patrol go missing, and Mayor Goodway gets stranded on a T-Rex!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos»Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!
